title: Adjustable Desk
description: Mobile and adjustable rolling C-table, ideal for use as a laptop stand or bedside table. Features a light wood-grain finish tabletop, a black metal frame, and four caster wheels for easy movement. The height can be adjusted with a manual knob.

title: Aprilia SR GT 200 scooter
description: Aprilia SR GT 200 adventure scooter in matte grey with top box and helmet.

title: Basic bike helmet
description: Photos captured under folder 'Basic bicycle helmet'.

title: Black+Decker Quick & Easy steam iron
description: Box mentions Quick & EASY branding, Duraglide non-stick soleplate, and "easy ironing" marketing copy.

title: Carsun foam sprayer
description: Carsun DIY foam sprayer with translucent tank, grey pump handle, and long wand for patio or bathroom cleaning.

title: Classical electro-acoustic guitar
description: Classical nylon-string electro-acoustic guitar. Features a natural wood top with a dark back and sides, a cutaway for easier access to higher frets, and an onboard preamp/tuner. The headstock and bridge appear to be standard classical style.

title: Rockrider Hybrid Bike Hand Pump
description: Decathlon Btwin 500 compact dual-action hand pump. Black body with a light grey grip, ideal for quick inflation of road or mountain bike tires.

title: Decathlon Hand Pump 100
description: Compact and versatile bike pump for hybrid, city, mountain, BMX, and kids' bikes. Universal head connects to Presta, Schrader, or Dunlop valves.

title: Decathlon Van Rysel helmet
description: Used for one week. Mint condition. Sticker shows Fluo Yellow colourway, size 55–59 cm, 330 g, EN1078:2012+A1 certified.

title: Dell OptiPlex 7060 Small Form Factor
description: Intel Core i-5 (gen to confirm). 1 TB NVME. 16 RAM.

title: Epson EcoTank L3250 A4 Wi-Fi all-in-one
description: Box highlights Print/Copy/Scan with Wi-Fi and Smart Panel support; ink yield quoted at 4,500 mono / 7,500 colour pages.
price_source_1_notes: Official retailer price for a new unit.

title: Gaming chair
description: Ergonomic gaming chair in black with red accents. Features a high backrest with detachable headrest and lumbar support pillows, adjustable armrests, and a five-star base with caster wheels. The material appears to be a faux leather or PVC.

title: Ikea white bedside table
description: IKEA KULLEN two-drawer chest in white. A simple, functional bedside table or small chest of drawers, suitable for a bedroom or guest room.

title: Laundry basket
description: Laundry basket or storage bin. Features a grey fabric exterior with a repeating white pattern and a solid light-colored interior lining. Includes two sturdy circular handles for easy carrying. There are 5 available, each for 20.

title: LINK Fross full-face helmet (M, 57-58 cm)
description: LINK Fross full-face helmet, size M (57-58 cm) with satin grey shell, dark visor, quick-release buckle, and ventilation ports.

title: LocknLock ceramic pot
description: LocknLock ceramic pot with glossy white finish and matching lid.

title: Apple MacBook Pro 13" (2018, 4× Thunderbolt 3)
description: 2.7GHz quad-core Intel Core i7, 16GB 2133MHz LPDDR3, Intel Iris Plus 655 (1536MB), serial C02XV5GRIHD2, running macOS Sequoia 15.5.

title: Mosquito killer
description: Cylindrical indoor mosquito and insect trap. Uses a purple UV light to attract insects and a fan to pull them into a collection chamber at the base. Powered via a USB cable.

title: Dish drying rack
description: Countertop dish drying rack with a transparent cover. Features a white plastic base with integrated draining slots and a clear, hinged lid to keep dishes protected while they dry. Includes compartments for plates, bowls, and utensils.

title: 15.6" USB-C portable monitor
description: Retail box confirms 15.6-inch portable monitor; need to capture ports/accessories from additional photos.

title: Decathlon Quechua Arpenaz Fresh & Black tent
description: Label notes Fresh & Black fabric, fiberglass poles, weight 3.2 kg (7 lb 10 oz).
